QuestData.Title: Death to the Scourge
QuestData.Description:
I haven't seen Scourge mustering in numbers like this since...
<Liadrin shakes her head, steeling herself.>
Never mind. There's no use dwelling in the past.
Our first priority is thinning their numbers enough that we can find out what--or who--is really behind this attack.
Slay as many of the undead as you can.
